Text: its not d 109min version... don deceive ppl.. its d cut 92min version.. fuck..

Mind ur words, ass hole. Its an error on my part, that I didn't update the correct run time, Its not an un-cut version, if it was, I would have mentioned it.

So for all those who are downloading, And wanted to see some bold scenes by Monica Bellucci, then sorry, this is the cut version with run time 92min.

But for those who wants to enjoy the movie and its plot, this version would do.

And my sincere apologies for the error.

Cheers!

i'm not a 12yr old like u, u fuckin cunt who downloads a movie jus2 c some boobs or bush... love scenes r always an integral part of d movie.. try watching SHAME (2011), widout d, wat did u say, "bold scenes".. u wudnt get d movie or d prowess of mcqueen n fassbender at all... maybe u dint mean to, but i was jus pointing out d fact.. sorry i was rude...
